bibl.title: The Use of Demotic in the Ptolemaic Administration.
bibl.note: The overwhelming majority of demotic cartonnage papyri are accounts and lists: this is the language in which the basic data were compiled at the local level; figures were transposed to Greek when they had to be given to the Greek administration at home level. - Reports on the work of the research group for demotic documents at the Sorbonne.

bibl.title: Egitto dai Faraoni agli Arabi. Atti del Convegno Egitto: amministrazione, economia, società, cultura dai Faraoni agli Arabi. Égypte: administration, économie, société, culture des Pharaons aux Arabes, Milano, Università degli Studi, 7-9 Gennaio 2013

bibl.seg: Willy Clarysse, The Use of Demotic in the Ptolemaic Administration.

Silvia Bussi (ed.), Egitto dai Faraoni agli Arabi. Atti del Convegno Egitto: amministrazione, economia, società, cultura dai Faraoni agli Arabi. Égypte: administration, économie, société, culture des Pharaons aux Arabes, Milano, Università degli Studi, 7-9 Gennaio 2013 = Studi ellenistici. Supplementi. 1 (Pisa - Roma, 2013) pp. 69-79, 2 tabl., 4 figg. coul.

The overwhelming majority of demotic cartonnage papyri are accounts and lists: this is the language in which the basic data were compiled at the local level; figures were transposed to Greek when they had to be given to the Greek administration at home level. - Reports on the work of the research group for demotic documents at the Sorbonne.
